# GitHub Copilot Instructions

**Source of Truth**: All project instructions, coding standards, and guidelines are maintained in [`CLAUDE.md`](../CLAUDE.md) at the repository root.

Please read and follow `CLAUDE.md` for:
- Project overview and current status
- Technology stack and design approach
- Key requirements (mobile-first, school branding, etc.)
- Project structure and file organization
- Development standards (TDD, test coverage)
- Payment integration guidelines
- Reference documents and design resources

This ensures consistent guidance across all AI coding assistants working on this project.
